page.title: 11LUCKINGTON POST OFFICE.
page.content: Luckington has general shop/Post office.A husband and wife team run the shop.They also have two part-time workers for the afternoon hours.The opening times are from 8.00a.m.until 6.00p.m.weekdays and 8.00a.m.until 1.00p.m.on Saturdays and Sundays. The quietest day is Wednesday and the busiest day is Saturday.The owners consider that a village shop can offer more personal prompt service than the large town stores and customers save petrol costs by shopping locally. There are daily deliveries . The most popular purchases are vegetables. The shop has a security screen around the Post Office counter, also there is a foot alarm in case of robbery. The owners prides itself on being able to supply any goods to it's customers. The shop has it's own trade emblem.
